description: This file is a Python script responsible for generating C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC API based on schema input. It includes functions to create API headers, generate classes and enums, and emit version and stub code, primarily for automating code generation tasks related to JSON-RPC interfaces.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file for the JSON-RPC API, including necessary headers and a standardized header comment.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates the code generation based on schema input, generating classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code as needed.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
